description:
This course will help you gain a better understanding of addition by using place value.

No more memorization!!

You will learn how the numbers are interacting with each other to form new numbers.

All the materials you need is provided:

  1. Exercise Sheets and Answer Key
  2. Place Value Disks Sheets for 1's, 10's and 100's.
  3. Place Value Mat

The course runs about 3 hours however, please work on each section and if possible do all the exercises & the end of section quiz before moving on to the next section.

This course starts with the basics of 1's and moves up to 100's. The great thing about place value is once you understand 1s - 100's you can follow the concepts into 1,000's and up.

This course also explains Regrouping or what we used to call "carry the one". This concept will be explained and you'll never have to memorize the phrase "carry the one" again because you will understand why regrouping is necessary and will make the adjustments without having to memorize.

The hope of this course is that you leave it:

Math confident!!!!
title: Singapore Math: Place Value Addition
